title: Good job on sacred sword Janna, Riot
body: It surprised me in a good way. I wasn't expecting to see skins that show us completely different shades of a champion (like reaper Soraka). I like it and I appreciate your thinking out of the box. I hope to see more skins like this in the future, I hope to see more original, unusual and yet beautiful skins like the reaper themed skin was for Soraka and the sacred sword is for Janna. Good job.

I don't have a link(it might not have been katey cause i just went through 8 months worth of her post and didn't see it). 
However, I found this.
> We have a skin in development right now (to be released later this year) that has the team divided. Some people feel it’s a slam dunk. Some feel it’s not the most obvious fit, but a risk worth taking. Others feel adamant that it’s a bad fit.
